markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cooperative Soul](/Feats.aspx?ID=75) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 57 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cooperative Nature](/Feats.aspx?ID=67)

</column>

---

You have developed a soul-deep bond with your comrades and maintain an even greater degree of cooperation with them. If you are at least an expert in the skill you are [Aiding](/Actions.aspx?ID=75), you get a success on any outcome rolled to Aid other than a critical success.
name: Cooperative Soul
